snippet: A new program succeeds in preventing sexual assault in the Navy, but it is also an anomaly in the midst of a crisis.
abstract: Editorial welcomes success of new program at the Navy's Naval Station Great Lakes, near Chicago, which has curbed number of sexual assaults significantly; notes the good news from the station is an anomaly in the midst of a sexual assault crisis in the military; calls for passage of proposal that would give independent military prosecutors power to decide which sexual crimes to try.
lead_paragraph: A new program succeeds in preventing sexual assault in the Navy, but it is also an anomaly in the midst of a crisis.

headline.main: One Drop in Military Sexual Violence
headline.print_headline: One Drop in Military Sexual Violence

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
